page.title: 18Bloxham Primary School Fete
page.content: The Bloxham Primary School Fete is an annual thing.The procession of about 8 floats starts at the Warriner school and leads through the village to the primary.The floats come from all places in Bloxham.There's a fancy dress float and a float for the queen and princess of the fete.The theme of all the floats this year was legends .When the procession finishes the judging takes place,then in the main arena the crowning of the queen and princess is done.They are crowned by a mytery guest who also opens the fete. Around are stalls and games,like soaking someone with a wet sponge,lucky dip,treasure hunt,jumble,toys,cakes,and many more.A refreshment tent,hotdog stall and ice cream van.In the main arena there's gym displays,country and maypole dancing,bands.At the end is prize giving and the Grand draw.
